tool_description: Inserts urgent emergency jobs into existing technician schedules by finding optimal insertion points and adjusting existing appointments when necessary.

emergency_job_id.description: Unique identifier for the emergency job

required_skills.description: Skills required for the emergency job

max_response_time.description: Maximum acceptable response time in minutes

allow_rescheduling.description: Whether existing jobs can be rescheduled

error_messages: No qualified technicians: No technicians available with required skills
Response time exceeded: Cannot meet maximum response time requirement
Schedule conflict: Cannot insert job without violating existing commitments
Invalid duration: Estimated duration must be positive integer
Mismatched data: technician_locations and technician_skills arrays must align with schedules
usage: Provide emergency job details and current schedule state to find the best technician and time slot for urgent job insertion.

assigned_technician.description: ID of technician assigned to emergency job

insertion_time.description: Scheduled start time for emergency job

rescheduled_jobs.description: Jobs that were rescheduled due to insertion
